ygData.subject: Edit! Names et al. Long but doing it in one post :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Gah!, When I saw a reply I noticed that when I edited my post down for brevity I deleted a key word ... The below *should * ... ... where while a minority is
ygData.messageBody:
Gah!, When I saw a reply I noticed that when I edited my post down for
brevity I deleted a key word ...

The below *should *
>- I'd also like to believe the Norrath culture is gay positive, where
>while
> a minority, subject to discrimination, after all *I* did grow up thinking
> it was all perfectly normal :)

... where while a minority is NOT subject to discrimination ...

<babbles insanely>
<mutters - make note to self to do player list>

Threw up the thesaurus words in hopes someone would play "mix & match" and
come up with one that sparked interest.

- Lora (good optimist, bad typist)
